column4: how does one change the gdm theme in lucid?  i tried using gdm2setup, but it doesnt seem to work.
see if this works on lucid    http://dl.dropbox.com/u/132551/REINSTALL%20LIST
when that opens at logon  it will "look"  like you are changing the  entire theme,,,but it will only change the gdm theme
even though you select a theme as if you were chaning the system theme
